description:
Lightweight replacement of Lenovo Vantage for Lenovo Legion laptops.

Lenovo Legion Toolkit (LLT) is a utility created for Lenovo Legion laptops, that allows changing a couple of features that are only available in Lenovo Vantage or Legion Zone.
Changes
- Resolved an issue where multiple models had no fan curve adjustment in version 2.26.9.6. #47 #67
- Resolved an issue where multiple models had no memory sensor reading in version 2.26.9.6. #46
- Resolved an issue where R7000 - R7000P model had no fan curve adjustment. #67 By @c6ForH66
- Resolved an issue where AFR10H was using an incorrect GodModeController version.
- Resolved an issue where some Legion 7 was using an incorrect GodModeController version.
- Resolved an issue that caused invalid VRAM temperature readings on the RTX 40 Series.
- Resolved an issue that caused memory utilization to display virtual memory instead of physical memory.
- Resolved an issue that caused the new dashboard to remain active even when PawnIO was not installed.
- Resolved an issue where the dialog window's font appeared black in dark theme.
- Resolved an issue that caused overlapping elements in the new dashboard.
- Resolved an issue on AFR10H and IAX10H Lenovo device, Ambient aft rgb lights are not working correctly. #53
- Resolved an issue where GPU Memory frequency shows effective frequency instead of real frequency. #69
- Resolved an issue where on AMD laptops the Motherboard temperatures was named as PCH instead of Motherboard.
  The PCH Sensor on AMD Laptops are real motherboard temperature sensor.
- Sensor Gadgets performance optimize
New
- Added Custom background image feature
- Added support for IdeaPad ITS Mode for IdeaPad, and Slim series. #45
- Added support for ThinkBook series. #52
- Added Hybrid Mode to Actions.
  Please note: Changing to DGPU or Hybrid mode requires a system restart.
- Added a Floating Gadget window.
Full Changelog: https://github.com/XKaguya/LenovoLegionToolkit/compare/v2.26.9.6...v2.26.9.7
